item.title: Public right of way gatw padlocked, 6th August
item.description:
The Gloucester way path next to the m5 junction 11. Under the railway bridge. Field that leads through to Churchdown is padlocked. Also the undergrowth is taking over the pathway.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Brockworth Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Repeated dig fouling, 6th August
item.description:

item.title: Unable to see vechiels approching due to tree regrowing and restricting view, 6th August
item.description:
Tree regrowing on pavement between number 8 and 10 is restricting views to pull off of drives, cant see whats coming down the road.this is not the first time this issue has been reported. there is going to be an accident at some point if this is not sorted.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 8, Tewkesbury Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet
